official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to assist the Yuma County Water Users' Association, Arizona, to relocate the headquarters of such association.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to take such action as may be necessary to make available to the Yuma County Water Users' Association, Arizona, suitable facilities for use by such association and to assist such association in relocating from its present facilities.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to assist the Yuma County Water Users' Association, Arizona, to relocate the headquarters of such association.
